body:

title: DeltaHawk2014 YT/Media App.

replies.body: Media apps are currently closed. The point of media is to stream tournaments. Just because you have a big yotube doesn't mean you will get it, Feel free to apply when they open!
replies.body_tagged: Media apps are currently closed. The point of media is to stream tournaments. Just because you have a big yotube doesn't mean you will get it, Feel free to apply when they open!

replies.body: The Media team are mostly looking for live streamers at the moment but as {tag=3feb57900603446c9bbfd5fb40759f41} said: "Feel free to apply when they open!"
replies.body_tagged: The Media team are mostly looking for live streamers at the moment but as  dev_revs said: "Feel free to apply when they open!"

replies.body:
Refer to what Shadowolf and Dev_revs said, I am going to lock this now that your question (sorta) has been answered. Best of luck applying when media applications do open!

Locking....
